00029 class member_logon
00030 {
00031     protected $username = '';
00032     protected $password = '';
00033 
00040     public function __construct($str_username, $str_password)
00041     {
00042         $this->username = $str_username;
00043         $this->password = $str_password;
00044     }
00045 
00046 
00053     public function valid($obj_db)
00054     {
00055         $_member_q = $obj_db->query("SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, m.inst_name,
00056             m.member_email, m.expire_date, m.register_date, m.is_pending,
00057             m.member_type_id, mt.member_type_name
00058             FROM member AS m LEFT JOIN mst_member_type AS mt ON m.member_type_id=mt.member_type_id
00059             WHERE m.member_id='".$obj_db->escape_string(trim($this->username))."'
00060                 AND m.mpasswd=MD5('".$obj_db->escape_string(trim($this->password))."')");
00061 
00062         // error check
00063         if ($obj_db->error) {
00064             echo '<div style="border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000; padding: 5px; margin: 3px;">'.__('Error authenticating user and password to database').'</div>';
00065             return false;
00066         }
00067 
00068         // check if the user exist in database
00069         if ($_member_q->num_rows < 1) {
00070             return false;
00071         } else {
00072             // fetch data
00073             $_member_d = $_member_q->fetch_assoc();
00074 
00075             // fill all sessions var
00076             $_SESSION['mid'] = $_member_d['member_id'];
00077             $_SESSION['m_name'] = $_member_d['member_name'];
00078             $_SESSION['m_email'] = $_member_d['member_email'];
00079             $_SESSION['m_institution'] = $_member_d['inst_name'];
00080             $_SESSION['m_logintime'] = time();
00081             $_SESSION['m_expire_date'] = $_member_d['expire_date'];
00082             $_SESSION['m_member_type_id'] = $_member_d['member_type_id'];
00083             $_SESSION['m_member_type'] = $_member_d['member_type_name'];
00084             $_SESSION['m_register_date'] = $_member_d['register_date'];
00085             $_SESSION['m_membership_pending'] = intval($_member_d['is_pending'])?true:false;
00086             $_SESSION['m_is_expired'] = false;
00087             // check member expiry date
00088             require_once SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_UTILS/simbio_date.inc.php';
00089             $_curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00090             if (simbio_date::compareDates($_member_d['expire_date'], $_curr_date) == $_curr_date) {
00091                 $_SESSION['m_is_expired'] = true;
00092             }
00093             // save md5sum of current application path
00094             // $_SESSION['checksum'] = md5($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].SENAYAN_BASE_DIR);
00095 
00096             // update the last login time
00097             $obj_db->query("UPDATE member SET last_login='".date("Y-m-d H:i:s")."',
00098                 last_login_ip='".$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']."'
00099                 WHERE member_id='".$_member_d['member_id']."'");
00100 
00101             return true;
00102         }
00103         return false;
00104     }
00105 }
